name: Granny Simulator

reviews:
honestly, i was in a pretty dark place before i found this game. i was a 5'3 loser,my wife left me, my kids cut contact with me and my dog hates me. but then, i was scrolling through the steam store and found this game and my life has changed, im a 6'11 king, i remarried (prime) megan fox and i have two lovely kids, and i also masturbate every night to the grandmother (the hips dont lie)

10/10 truly, honestly, and undoubtedly a masterpiece.
hey does someone can ask the creator/owner of granny simulator to add the graphics settings i wanted my graphics to be low or super low
Granny hit me with a sofa then abused and afterwards hit the freakiest juno pose I've ever seen 10/10
really fun with friends but no one plays it anymore

Was granny, did hit the Juno pose, was freaky
10/10
Kicked my little shit of a grandson across the house
NO UPDATES & The Game Is Kinda Boring After A Couple Minutes
bully the shyt out of your grandma
Deserved to win Game of the Year

short_description: In Granny Simulator there are two players, a feeble old grandmother and her lovely grandson. The grandmothers objective is to complete her every day routine while the grandson utilizes uncanny violence and pure brutality to stop her.
